signature: <T extends Schema<X>, X> DeferredChanged<ChangedSchema> diff(RecursiveSchemaSet, Components, Components, T, T, DiffContext)

enhanced_by.reason: Environment setup is required before performing schema diff operations.
The OpenApiDiff instance is required for the diff operation to function correctly.
Verifying the consistency of the ChangedSchema output can help ensure the correctness of the diff operation.
This method compares additional properties, which is a part of the schema diff process and can inform assertions about the diff result.
